titles.title: Expanding Building Efficiency Incentives Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to improve and extend certain energy-related tax provisions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/8/2009--Introduced. Expanding Building Efficiency Incentives Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) increase and extend through 2015 the new energy efficient home tax credit; (2) increase the rate of the tax deduction for energy efficient commercial buildings; (3) increase to $5,000 the limit on the tax credit for nonbusiness energy property expenditures and extend such credit through 2015; (4) allow a $200 tax credit through 2011 for the cost of a home energy rating; and (5) allow a $500 tax credit for the cost of training and certifying home performance auditors to conduct home energy ratings.
